arStrings.szText: While {c_important}Blade Shift{/c} is active you gain {c_number}[{SF_1}*100|+%|]{/c} Resistance to All Elements and reduce the duration of incoming Control Impairing Effects by {c_number}[{SF_16}*100|%|]{/c} .
While {c_important}Blade Shift{/c} is active you gain {c_number}[{SF_8}*{SF_15}*100|%+|]{/c} Movement Speed and moving through enemies refreshes its duration.
Casting a Skill other than {c_important}Blade Shift{/c} empowers your next {c_important}Blade Shift{/c} to deal {c_number}[SF_21*100|%x|]{/c} increased damage.
